statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE engagement_score > 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp, engagement_score FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, engagement_score FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY user_id, activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, engagement_score FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND engagement_score < 70 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE engagement_score >= 60 AND activity_type != 'logout' ORDER BY activity_type ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, username, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(engagement_type) AS total_engagement_count FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_engagement_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity JOIN engagement_metrics ON user_activity.user_id = engagement_metrics.user_id WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT username, activity_type, engagement_score FROM user_activity LEFT JOIN engagement_metrics ON user_activity.user_id = engagement_metrics.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, email, metric_timestamp FROM engagement_metrics WHERE metric_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(engagement_score) > 50;

SELECT users.username, user_activity.activity_type, engagement_metrics.engagement_score FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id JOIN engagement_metrics ON users.user_id = engagement_metrics.user_id WHERE engagement_metrics.engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY engagement_metrics.engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY activity_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY like_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content, like_date FROM likes INNER JOIN posts ON likes.post_id = posts.post_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT post_content, post_date, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM posts LEFT JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY posts.post_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE users.username = 'Alice' AND comments.user_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(posts.post_id) AS total_posts FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_posts > 5 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, content, likes FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, follower_user_id FROM followers WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, content, likes FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users INNER JOIN followers ON users.user_id = followers.user_id WHERE followers.follower_user_id = 12345;
SELECT post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = 54321 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT users.username, posts.content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
